title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2205.1 - Generally
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2205.1 - Generally

State Regulations

Awards made pursuant to the provisions of this Subchapter
by the corporation are made based upon information provided to the corporation
by the applicant and by the institution of attendance. Applicants and
institutions of attendance shall be responsible for the accuracy of information
provided the corporation in accordance with the guidelines specified
hereinafter in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2205.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
